name: Gryphon Trio with Nordic Voices

location.name: Jane Mallett Theatre, St. Lawrence Centre for the Arts

description:
Enjoy an evening of musical exploration, featuring new works by living composers from Canada and around the world. This unique, once-in-a-lifetime concert presents four commissioned pieces by some of today's most compelling and emotionally resonant composers. 

Join us for the world premieres of new works by Andrew Balfour and Norbert Palej. Attend North American premiere of "Will Sing Life Again" by Ukrainian composer Bohdana Frolyaka, with the poignant setting of texts by acclaimed journalist Viktoria Amelina. The program concludes with "Scar Tissue", a major work created by Music TORONTO's longtime composer-in-residence, Jeffrey Ryan, in collaboration with Giller Prize-winning author and poet Michael Redhill.

name: Dialogues - Echoes, Fields and Fragments Exhibition
description:
Enjoy Maren Boedeker's body of large-scale, mixed-media paintings grounded in intuitive perception and process. Drawing from sensory experiences - colours, landscapes, environments, fragments of sound, music, and voices – Maren approaches painting as a dialogue with the canvas, allowing each work to unfold through responsiveness rather than predetermined intention. 

About the Artist
Maren Boedeker is a Toronto-based artist who earned an MA in Fine Arts and Art Education from the University of Fine Arts Münster, Germany. She was awarded first place in the 'Art for Europe' exhibition, curated by the European Community, Brussels. Since moving to Toronto, Maren has participated in residency programs at the Museum of Contemporary Art and Collision Gallery. Maren is member of the Colour-and-Form-Society, has exhibited across Canada and Europe, including the European Community Brussels, the Museum of Contemporary Art Toronto, and her work is held in private and public collections.

name: Improv Class at Soulpepper
description:
Whether you are an experienced artist, improv enthusiast or just curious about the world of improv, this course welcomes you! 

Our class caters to all walks of life and through communal activities we will explore the power of "Yes and..", fundamentals of narrative construction, and dabble in a bit of theatre devising. We can't wait to meet you!
